tag_list: kunst, art, investment, capital, backlinks, arnold-ritter, leipzig-school, therapy, berlin
overview:
Schau is a social media startup. Located in Berlin, Germany.

The company schau GmbH provides three main branches:

  1. social services for familys, like parent training programms, coaching and consulting with high quality.
  2. a web-guide for psycho-social issues in Berlin with link indexes for all therapies in Berlin. The information is complete and frequently updated. The growing interest improves the ranking of the website. Advertising income is growing fast.
  3. a art gallery with a specialisation in healing artworks for decorative and also therapeutic use. The unique works from the artist Arnold Ritter (photographer from Leipzig School) shown in the exhibition MOMENTAUFNAHMEN (snapshots) are exlusively available here.

Investors: schau offers 4% for any 10 t â‚¬ investment capital until 30.04.2012. Send an email to info@praeventionszentrum.org for more information.
